data.eml:eml: Observations on the Biology of Afrotropical Hesperiidae (Lepidoptera). Part 8. Hesperiinae incertae sedis: Dracaena Feeders

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cock, Matthew J. W., Congdon, T. Colin E., Collins, Steve C. (2015): Observations on the Biology of Afrotropical Hesperiidae (Lepidoptera). Part 8. Hesperiinae incertae sedis: Dracaena Feeders. Zootaxa 3985 (3): 301-348, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3985.3.1
